entries.name: HTML_ENTITIES
entries.desc: HTML entity name map for RDoc::Markdown

entries.name: new(extensions = DEFAULT_EXTENSIONS, debug = false)
entries.desc: Creates a new markdown parser that enables the given extensions.

entries.name: parse(markdown)
entries.desc: Parses the markdown document into an RDoc::Document using the default extensions.

entries.name: emphasis(text)
entries.desc: Wraps text in emphasis for rdoc inline formatting

entries.name: link_to(content, label = content, text = nil)
entries.desc: Finds a link reference for label and creates a new link to it with content as the link text. If label was not encountered in the reference-gathering parser pass the label and content are reconstructed with the linking text (usually whitespace).

entries.name: list_item_from(unparsed)
entries.desc: Creates an RDoc::Markup::ListItem by parsing the unparsed content from the first parsing pass.

entries.name: note(label)
entries.desc: Stores label as a note and fills in previously unknown note references.

entries.name: note_for(ref)
entries.desc: Creates a new link for the footnote reference and adds the reference to the note order list for proper display at the end of the document.

entries.name: orig_initialize(extensions = DEFAULT_EXTENSIONS, debug = false)
entries.desc: TODO remove when kpeg 0.10 is released

entries.name: paragraph(parts)
entries.desc: Creates an RDoc::Markup::Paragraph from parts and including extension-specific behavior

entries.name: reference(label, link)
entries.desc: Stores label as a reference to link and fills in previously unknown link references.

entries.name: strong(text)
entries.desc: Wraps text in strong markup for rdoc inline formatting
